modelBrowser.filterPlaceholder: Filter models by name or provider...
modelBrowser.noModelsMatchFilters: No models match the current filters.
modelBrowser.selectModel: Select a model from the list to see details

providerSettings.title: Provider Configuration
providerSettings.description: Add, remove, or configure connections to AI providers. Enable models within each provider's edit section. Click a model name to view its details.
providerSettings.noProviders: No providers configured yet. Click "Add Provider Configuration" above.

modelEnablement.noModelsAvailable: No models available for this provider. Try fetching models.
modelEnablement.noModelsMatchFilters: No models match the current filters.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.advancedVisible: Advanced configuration options are visible. Toggle off to hide complex settings.
generalSettings.advancedHidden: Basic mode - advanced configuration options are hidden. Toggle on to show all settings.
generalSettings.enableStreamingMarkdownDescription: Render Markdown formatting as the response arrives (may impact performance slightly).
generalSettings.enableStreamingCodeBlockParsingLabel: Use Full Code Blocks While Streaming
generalSettings.enableStreamingCodeBlockParsingDescripti: Use the syntax-highlighting component for code blocks during streaming.
generalSettings.foldStreamingCodeBlocksLabel: Fold Code Blocks by Default During Streaming
generalSettings.foldStreamingCodeBlocksDescription: Automatically collapse code blocks as they stream in. Useful for long code outputs.
generalSettings.foldUserMessagesOnCompletionDescription: Automatically collapse the user's prompt message once the assistant finishes responding.
generalSettings.enableAutoScrollOnStreamDescription: Automatically scroll to the bottom as new content arrives.
generalSettings.streamingUpdateRateDescription: Controls how frequently the UI updates during streaming (3-60 FPS).
generalSettings.autoScrollIntervalDescription: The delay between auto-scroll checks during streaming (50-5000 ms).
generalSettings.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset Streaming & Display settings to their defaults?

settingsModal.title: Settings
settingsModal.description: Manage application settings, AI behavior, API keys, providers, and data.

noTabs.message: No settings tabs available or still loading. Check console for module registration errors.
noTabs.toast: Settings tab "{{tabName}}" not found. Opening default tab.

assistantPrompts.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Import, export, or clear your application data. Use full import/export for backups or migrations.
dataManagement.importConversationsDescription: Import conversations from a previously exported JSON file. This only imports chat history.
dataManagement.exportConversationsDescription: Export all your conversations into a single JSON file. This only includes chat history.
dataManagement.fullExportDescription: Select the data to include in your full backup file.
dataManagement.fullImportDescription: Import a full backup file. This will overwrite existing data for selected categories.
dataManagement.dangerZoneDescription: These actions are destructive and cannot be undone. Proceed with caution.
dataManagement.importConfirmation: Importing this file will OVERWRITE existing data for the selected categories. Are you sure you want to proceed?
dataManagement.clearDataConfirmationTitle: ðŸš¨ ARE YOU ABSOLUTELY SURE? ðŸš¨
dataManagement.clearDataConfirmationMessage: This will permanently delete ALL conversations, messages, mods, settings, providers, and stored API keys from your browser. This action cannot be undone.
dataManagement.clearDataSecondConfirmation:
SECOND CONFIRMATION:

Really delete everything? Consider exporting first.
dataManagement.dataClearedSuccess: All local data cleared. Reloading the application...
